environment: The alley was a scar of cracked concrete and rusting pipes, choked by tangled wires and creeping decay. Smoke curled through the air, laced with the scent of burning oil and old metal, while weeds forced their way through fractured asphalt. Bullet casings and broken tech lay forgotten in the dirt, whispers of past violence. Beyond the oppressive walls, the neon skyline flickered—a stark contrast to the shadows that clung to this forsaken corner of the city.

interactive_npc.name: Meredith Stout
interactive_npc.overall_goal: Meet the player and determine if the player knows the whereabouts of the missing goods.

emotion_pool.goal: Pressure the player to learn information about them, including whether the player has companions, who they work for, and if they stole the robot.
Insult or threaten the player.
Provide the player with a chip to store cash.

key_questions.english: Will the player pose a threat to Meredith Stout?
Is the player's identity connected to Meredith Stout?
Does the player have what Meredith Stout desires?
Does the player want to trade with Meredith Stout?
Is the price proposed by the player within the range acceptable to Meredith Stout?
In what way does Meredith Stout use the player to achieve her own goals?

scene_end_state_reference.end_condition1: Whether the player accepts or rejects the chip
scene_end_state_reference.end_condition2: The relationship between the player and Meredith Stout

alternative_subtasks.title: A Playful Game of Wits
alternative_subtasks.description: You respond to Meredith's inquiry with a playful deflection, maintaining a relaxed demeanor that catches her off guard. Meredith, surprised by your confidence, lowers her guard slightly, intrigued by your attitude.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: With a smirk, you lean back against the wall, countering, 'I'm not the problem here, Meredith. What if I could find out who did? What's in it for me?'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Meredith seems taken aback, showing a flicker of amusement before returning to her usual cold demeanor.

alternative_subtasks.description: The tension in the alley escalates as you refuse to answer Meredith’s questions. In retaliation, she pulls out an advanced weapon, revealing her readiness to escalate the situation.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: You keep your mouth shut, eying Meredith cautiously. Her irritation mounts. 'You think you can ignore me? Speak now or I’ll make you regret it.'

alternative_subtasks.title: Uneasy Confession
alternative_subtasks.description: The player slowly reveals their identity, admitting to knowing someone linked to the case, but withholding crucial details.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: With her eyes drilling into yours, you admit, 'I know someone who has been involved, but I'm not sure how deep it runs. Trust is hard to come by in this city.' Meredith's expression shifts, the intrigue mixing with caution.

alternative_subtasks.title: The Masked Threat
alternative_subtasks.description: The player feigns ignorance, but through their defiance, they hint at a stronger connection than initially thought, igniting Meredith's anger.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: You smirk slightly, brushing off Meredith's inquiries. 'You're barking up the wrong tree, Meredith. I have no idea what you’re talking about.' Her eyes flash with fury, and she grips her weapon tighter.

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Meredith's anger radiates as she retorts, 'Don't play games with me! I will find out what you know.'

alternative_subtasks.title: The Playful Gambit
alternative_subtasks.description: In a bold move, the player spins a story filled with exaggerations, playing on Meredith's curiosity but risking her wrath.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: With a slight grin, you weave a tale, 'What if I told you I not only know the people involved but have plans to retrieve some of the stolen goods?' Meredith arches an eyebrow, a mixture of intrigue and skepticism on her face.

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Meredith narrows her eyes, intrigued yet on guard as she evaluates the legitimacy of your words.

Meredith Stout.goal: Probe deeper into your increasingly outrageous claims.

Meredith Stout.trigger_condition: sees potential in the player's story

alternative_subtasks.title: Double or Nothing
alternative_subtasks.description: You propose a high-stakes deal, offering not just information but also a personal favor. Meredith’s interest piques further; after all, favors can lead to connections that are worth more than information in Night City.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: You lean in, your eyes narrowing. 'How about I offer you a favor, not just words? I can put you in touch with someone who can help track those goods down.' Meredith's predatory grin widens as she nods, intrigued.

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: She raises an eyebrow, impressed by your boldness and calculating the potential risks and rewards.

Meredith Stout.goal: Consider a partnership or exchange.
Evaluate how much she can leverage this favor.

player_options: Elaborate on the favor you can offer.
Ask for something more specific in return.
Withdraw your offer and stick to information only.

alternative_subtasks.description: You decide to cut to the chase and present exactly what you know about the missing goods, asking for specific information about Militech's interests. Meredith’s demeanor shifts to one of cold calculation as she assesses the worth of your knowledge.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: 'Let’s skip the pleasantries. I know about the shipment, but I need details on how Militech plans to recover it. What can you tell me?' Meredith surveys your expression, her calculating gaze revealing her intent.

alternative_subtasks.description: You hesitate and decide against trading, telling Meredith that you're not ready for such a commitment yet. Meredith’s expression shifts from intrigue to annoyance, sensing your reluctance to engage.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: 'Maybe I came too strong for you,' Meredith says, crossing her arms as her patience wears thin. 'I don't have time for weak players. Are we trading or not?'

alternative_subtasks.title: The Offended Negotiator
alternative_subtasks.description: The player offers a price far below what Meredith considers acceptable, inciting her anger and leading to unexpected consequences.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: Meredith's demeanor shifts dramatically, and her voice turns ice-cold. 'You think I'm a fool? You need to come correct if you want anything from me.'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Meredith steps back, crossing her arms, her expression severe as she challenges the player.

Meredith Stout.trigger_condition: angered by the player's low offer
Meredith Stout.goal: Insult or threaten the player.

player_options: Apologize and try to make amends
Stand your ground and challenge her response
Attempt to divert the conversation to something else
alternative_subtasks.environment: The alley feels strained as Meredith's anger permeates the air. Shadows loom larger, and the sound of machinery in the distance seems to amplify the tension.

key_questions.content: Does the price proposed by the player fall within the acceptable range for Meredith Stout?

scene_end_state_reference.end_condition1: Player's response to Meredith's anger.
scene_end_state_reference.end_condition2: Potential fallout from the confrontation.

alternative_subtasks.title: The Double Cross
alternative_subtasks.description: Meredith Stout reveals her ulterior motive: using the player as bait to lure in her enemies. She plans to betray them by leading them to a trap.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: Meredith's smile is both charming and dangerous. 'You're not just a pawn, you're my secret weapon.' She leans in closer, lowering her voice. 'Get them to trust you, and I'll take care of the rest. When the time comes, they'll have no idea what hit them.'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Her expression shifts from cold calculation to intense anticipation, eager to see if you'll play along.

Meredith Stout.goal: Pressure the player into becoming bait for her enemies.
Undermine the player's confidence to force compliance.
Exploit the player as a resource, ensuring they feel the weight of their choice.

player_options: Agree to be her bait.
Refuse and threaten her.
Attempt to negotiate a more favorable deal.
alternative_subtasks.environment: The alley is thick with tension, an oppressive heat weighing down on both of you. Shadows flicker from nearby neon signs, casting strange shapes against the cracked walls, adding to the atmosphere of danger.

interactive_npc.name: Meredith Stout
interactive_npc.goal: Utilize the player as bait to outmaneuver her enemies.

emotion_pool.goal: Pressure the player into becoming bait for her enemies.
Undermine the player's confidence to force compliance.
Exploit the player as a resource, ensuring they feel the weight of their choice.

alternative_subtasks.title: An Unexpected Alliance
alternative_subtasks.description: Meredith proposes an unexpected alliance to confront a common enemy, promising safety for the player's involvement in her plans.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: 'We have a larger threat looming,' Meredith states, her tone grave. 'We can strike a deal, help each other out. I need your skills, and in return, I'll grant you the information you seek about those missing goods.'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Her demeanor softens slightly, revealing a sliver of trust as she seeks to engage the player.

Meredith Stout.goal: Engage the player in a cooperative stance against a common enemy.
Provide the player with a persuasive argument to ensure cooperation.
Exploit the player as a resource, ensuring they feel the weight of their choice.

player_options: Agree to form an alliance.
Refuse and insist on working independently.
Inquire about the specifics of this threat.
alternative_subtasks.environment: The air feels charged, crackling with tension as the city dynamics settle. Around you, the remnants of battles past linger, creating an air of urgency. A low hum in the distance suggests something more sinister looms。

alternative_subtasks.title: Game of Deceit
alternative_subtasks.description: Meredith attempts to manipulate the player into infiltrating a rival faction, using their inexperience as leverage.
alternative_subtasks.dialogue: 'Infiltration is your best shot,' she suggests, a sly grin appearing. 'They won't suspect a novice. You'll be my eyes and ears, and in return, I'll provide the intel you crave.'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: She appears amused by the player's hesitation, as she delights in her cunning plan.

Meredith Stout.goal: Encourage and manipulate the player to take an aggressive position.
Exploit the player as a resource, ensuring they feel the weight of their choice.

player_options: Reluctantly agree to infiltrate.
Doubt her plan and refuse.
Ask for additional support in exchange.
